text: Alexandre Michel GÃ©rard Desplat (born August 23, 1961) is a French film composer and conductor. == Early life == Desplat was born in Paris to Jacques Desplat and Katie Ladopoulou. His parents are of French and Greek ancestry. == Other websites == * Category:1961 births Category:21st-century French composers Category:Living people Category:Movie score composers Category:Musicians from Paris Category:20th-century French composers
